column5: I am looking for any information on Copilot Lake, I am looking at flying in to this outpost with a group of friends but I want to make sure it is a great lake to fish. Also what is the cabin like to stay in? If anyone has any info, please let me know asap. Thanks!!!!

sorry dont know about copilot lake but have fished many outposts out of armstrong and they are fantastic.have a trip booked for june and could use some people to fill it up..if of any interest contact [email protected]
